body.name: Dr. Brown's Milestones Narrow Sippy Bottle, 100% Silicone Soft Sippy Spout, 8oz/250mL, Flamingo & Bunny, 6m+

features: TRANSITION SIPPY BOTTLE. As baby’s feeding progresses, transition to soft silicone sippy spout to teach new drinking skills.
GROWS WITH BABY. Sippy spout helps teach baby new drinking skills while using the familiar bottle.
SILICONE SIPPY SPOUT. Sippy spout fits any Dr. Brown’s Options+ Narrow bottle. Just remove the vent system.
TRAVEL SIPPY BOTTLE. Snap-on cap keeps the spout clean when on the go.
EASY TO CLEAN. All parts are dishwasher (top rack only) and sterilizer safe. BPA free.
body.description: Dr. Brown’s® Milestones™ Sippy Bottle is the perfect first step for baby’s transition from bottle to cup. Introducing a sippy spout has never been simpler. The soft silicone sippy spout is used in place of the nipple on the Dr. Brown’s bottle that’s already familiar to baby, while the snap-on cap keeps the spout clean when on-the-go. The sippy spout fits any Dr. Brown’s® Options+™ Narrow bottle after the internal vent is removed. All parts are safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. 6m+.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dr. Brown's Options+ Sippy Spout Baby Bottles Turn your Dr. Brown’s Options Bottle into a sippy bottle for easy bottle-to-cup transition! Take the bottle baby is familiar with and turn it into a sippy cup, with the Dr. Brown’s Options Bottle Sippy Spout. Just remove the Dr. Brown’s Options vent and replace the current bottle nipple with the Bottle Sippy Spout for gradual learning. The simple-to-sip spout features 100% soft silicone and assembles in seconds. Easy clean, dishwasher (top rack) and sterilizer safe. Available for Dr. Brown’s Options and Dr. Brown’s Options Wide-Neck bottles. BPA free. 6m+. Easy to sip and spill-proof Soft, 100% silicone spout is gentle on little mouths Easy to clean and top-rack dishwasher safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish I knew about this before when my kids were transitioning bottles to sippy cups. I bought the fox+lion and bunny bottles. My baby loves his. I am happy that I can buy extra nipples for his bottles. It’s cute, it isn’t too wide to hold for babies, he can just easily grip on it. Looks more comfortable when he’s drinking using this bottle, in comparison to his older bottles. Easy to clean as well! So happy Baby & Mommy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean and good transition from bottle
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter prefers this to a bottle. It's a great transition from one. Also, very easy to clean and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby girl loves these
reviews.reviewText: These are super nice and big , nipples are perfect for my two year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - wouldn't recommend as starter sippy
reviews.reviewText: These sippy nipple are pretty quick. My 7 month old is a good eater and drinker and she's been using sippy cups since 4.5 months old and she still almost always gets a little choked up on these so we have put them away until she's a little older. Great quality though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you are hesitant read my review and I think it will help!
reviews.reviewText: So I ordered this for my 1 year old because his ped mentioned he should really drink his milk from a sippy cup. I tried and he hated it and I felt like he was still little to take the bottle away. He drinks his water and juice from a sippy but for nap/bedtime milkies he likes his bottle. I found this for transitioning and I was so excited. We have always used the Dr. browns wide neck since he was born because I breastfeed (still). I noticed these didn’t have the vent so I was hesitant. We tried it and he was like “what the hell is this mom,” because of the nipple and he choked because of the bubbles and the flow. I bought vents to put inside his bottle (pictured above) and he seems to like it ALOT now. It’s only the second day we’ve had them. I noticed it has leaked a couple times I think that’s due to the vents but I would rather it leak a little than my little one drink bubbles. Also, the designs are adorable! In conclusion, I think these are great transitioning bottles, however if your baby is used to the vents for bubbles I would recommend getting those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t give up HOPE - this was winner!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this on 1/30/23 and our son didn’t take it until yesterday 12/13/23. We thought he would never give up his bottle w/ nipple - he has texture issues and also very strong-willed. He is almost 3 years old and NEVER drank from anything else other than a baby bottle. This is literally the “breakthrough” sippy cup/bottle. It makes sense because the shape and feel is the most similar to a traditional baby bottle. The sippy spout is soft and it’s in the center of the cap, as opposed to being off-center like the other sippy cups. All the small details make a big difference. Our little one is smart too, so he can tell right away if it’s too different from something he’s used to. If you’re in a similar situation, don’t give up hope. Give your child the time they need until they are ready to do something. Keep introducing every few months until they are ready to accept it. We hope this helps! …P.S. My husband made the hole in the spout bigger to make it easier for our little one to drink out from so it wouldn’t take much effort for him to get the “payoff” for trying to drink from a new bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these were absolutely perfect for the transition between bottle and sippy cup. it made it so much easier for my bottle loving baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only bottle that help my toddler transition to sippy.
Cómo siempre, amo la marca y estás en específico porque ya traen la bombona de aire en el mismo chapón no como la mayoría de las de browns

reviews.reviewTitle: SUPER PRACTICOS PARA HACER LA TRANSICIÓN DE BIBERON A BOTELLA.
reviews.reviewText: ES MAS PRÁCTICA SU LIMPIEZA EN COMPARACIÓN CON EL SITEMA QUE TIENEN LOS BIBERONES DE INICIO DE LA MISMA MARCA

Encantadisima.... M costaba trabajo intentar q mi bebe de 2 años 9 meses dejara el biberon, un drama siempre 😰 hasta q llego este producto a mis ojos... Lo ame... Enseguida el. Dia q llegaron, lo acepto... No noto el cambio, durmio en la noche genial... Ni sufrió él, ni tampoco yo🎉super recomendable! 🏅
A mi bebé le encanta este biberón es súper práctico!!!!
El precio es bueno, son dos piezas, me encantó y me han servido mucho, buena calidad
